title: 0604K書中心B館開放 Reopening of K Book Center Building B on June 4th
author: 游守正
content:
分類： 其他公告
來源： 教學卓越中心 - 游守正 - cecil@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6594
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 0604K書中心B館開放 Reopening of K Book Center Building B on June 4th
日期： Mon, 3 Jun 2024 20:06:42 +0800

親愛的教職員生：
(1).集賢樓K書中心B館內側自習區天花板輕鋼架與冷氣已修復完畢，將於6/04上午9：30起重新開放；因A館已無法使用，B館暑假期間會持續開放。惟預定於8月底時閉館兩週，進行留置物品整理與場地之清潔，再開放時間將於開學後擇期公告。

(2).B館因座位有限，部分地震前留置之物品已被移置，若是回到現場發現東西不在原本的位置上，請洽現場工讀生確認身份拿取；適逢期末考週，嚴禁留置物品佔位，本中心現場工讀生將嚴格執行此一規定。

Dear Faculty, Staff, and Students,

The ceiling light steel frame and air conditioning in the inner study area of the Ji Xian Building K Book Center Building B have been fully repaired and will reopen on June 4th at 9:30 AM. Since Building A is no longer usable, Building B will remain open during the summer. However, it is scheduled to close for two weeks at the end of August for the organization of left items and cleaning of the premises. The reopening time will be announced after the new semester begins.

Due to limited seating in Building B, some items left before the earthquake have been relocated. If you find your belongings are not in their original place, please contact the on-site student worker to confirm your identity and retrieve your items. As it is the final exam week, reserving seats with personal belongings is strictly prohibited. On-site student workers will strictly enforce this rule.

Best regards,
Center of Teaching Excellence
